website_summaries.verdict: It’s hard to beat the Fitug Orb’s low price, but for $10 more, the Fitbit Zip has more features, is easier to use, and is ultimately a better buy.
pros: For $50, the Fitbug Orb counts steps, calories, and syncs data wirelessly to phones
The fitness tracker is also light, comfortable, and stays put on your wrist
You can also wear the Orb on a bundled clip
cons: The Fitbug Orb lacks a display, is complicated to set up, and its button is small and hard to press
You can’t use the Orb’s mobile app to log meals, and it has limited Android compatibility
Sleep mode is tricky to engage, and wireless PC syncing costs extra

customer_reviews.title: Company went out of business--no app support
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that they would even sell something that has no way of being used.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Company is shutdown and so is the app! Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is really disappointing that Amazon continues to sell products that are new but the company has since shutdown and is no longer providing support for the devices or the apps associated! Action is needed to stop these types of sales by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't count about 20% of my steps. On ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't count about 20% of my steps. On a 1 mile walk, it dropped over 400 steps! I am returning it. I have decided to amend this a bit - the Orb is probably great if you are counting steps on a longer, uninterrupted walk/run. It doesn't seem to be sensitive enough if you are trying to count steps while walking around the house or shopping or walking a dog - any time you have to stop frequently. It doesn't count a lot of those steps.
customer_reviews.author: AuntFig

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend just investing a Fitbit
customer_reviews.text: Never worked even after contacting customer support! I would recommend just investing a Fitbit, much easier. This truly wasn't worth the hassle and I sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I got great customer service from this company after I lost my ...
customer_reviews.text: I got great customer service from this company after I lost my Orb shortly after purchase. They reached out to me yesterday and shipped out the replacement immediately! I have no issues with the products functionality, the product does for me what I got it for! I love the gadget!
customer_reviews.author: Bozaya

customer_reviews.title: So light weight and easy to interchange from the clip to the band
customer_reviews.text: So light weight and easy to interchange from the clip to the band. Didn't realize I had to run the app which used my data.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Gaw

customer_reviews.title: Fitbug ORB
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fit bug for my fiancée. She loves it and wears it everyday. She keeps track of her calories burned and steps taken. Even just while cleaning around the house. Great gift for someone who is in to fitness.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Product works OK, but not so sure about accuracy. Also the Sleep mode is not really useful if your a restless, toss and turn type of sleeper. Sync is a little difficult. There are several free apps that run on your cell phone and dont require data plans that are more accurate in my view.
customer_reviews.author: Larry K

customer_reviews.title: Product and software discontinued
customer_reviews.text: Product is obsolete- activation software no longer available. Should not even be offered for sale. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Dorna R.

customer_reviews.title: She has enjoyed her fitbug
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tracker for my wife. She has enjoyed her fitbug. It does monitor sleep, but detects non-movement as sleep. Also detects movement for excercise, such as riding in a golf cart. It does come off the wrist at night occasionally and at times will cut off from monitoring sleep. Very easy to use and connected to the iphone 5. For the price, I believe this product is comparable to the more pricey trackers.
customer_reviews.author: bonedoc

customer_reviews.title: It went through the wash and still works!
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to put in a review for this item because I accidentally put it through the wash, and it still works! I use the clip, and wear it everywhere. Hopefully I won't "wash" it again, but I am very impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Westcoastgirl

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Was great for the first month, then the orb fell out of the wrist band and was lost. It was the wrist band that came with the product so there's no reason it should have fallen out so easily. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: khume74

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was destroyed. Battery has already died after 2 weeks. When I tried to register it says it has already been registered so I had to go through a lot of problems trying to get that under my name. Fitbug itself has a couple scratches on the top. Don't know if it's from damaged packaging or because someone else wore it first. I don't think it accurately track my movement, however, the sleep tracker seems to be working effectively. Overall not happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Megz C.

customer_reviews.title: be aware
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that if you lose your subscription number in the packaging the entire purchase is a waste and you will never know your steps.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa P.

customer_reviews.title: Bumpy start but great buddy.
customer_reviews.text: My fitbug is pretty inconspicuous and easy to wear. Even when cycling it doesn't collect all the sweat and become uncomfortable. My only complaint is that when i was setting it up it took a whole day to sync and connect to the mobile app. Now it is just fine, I manually update my data and its grand.
customer_reviews.author: Vellito Enrique Etrada

customer_reviews.title: Pretty basic but it met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Pretty basic but it met my expectations, I have since upgraded to the fitbit which I am happier with.
customer_reviews.author: Dee7713

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Every feature worked except for the pedometer, which is the main reason I ordered it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have had for less than a day; tried ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had for less than a day; tried it last night; just went walking and nothing is synching; only paid less than $40; returning and ordering Ifit about $100. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: jdotray

customer_reviews.title: Great, but...
customer_reviews.text: Great basic tracker. Only downside was that I lost it, it came out of the wrist band.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: I still have not got it to work. Maybe ...
customer_reviews.text: I still have not got it to work. Maybe the battery was dead , the ipad app never detected the tracker. Maybe when I get time...
customer_reviews.author: anirban

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: the tracker works well, but it takes a few days to get a feel for the controls and sync interface.

customer_reviews.title: works great! counts my steps
customer_reviews.text: works great! counts my steps. makes me want to walk/run more!
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the product not the seller.
customer_reviews.text: The seller is excellent. However, the product doen't work properly and the Fitbug customer service is terrible.

customer_reviews.title: Black tracker

customer_reviews.title: Gettin skinnier!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great tool. Actually now focused on my health - and it's helped me IMPROVE already.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work like it says it's going to
customer_reviews.text: I would give it zero stars but that wasn't an option. It doesn't work like it says it's going to. It syncs to your phone but doesn't accurately keep track. It was a waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Champlin

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't worked properly since the day I got it sadly ...
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't worked properly since the day I got it sadly. Tried contacting with no help. Spent the extra and go with fitbit!!
customer_reviews.author: Desirea McGee

customer_reviews.title: Help yourself at 1/2 the price
customer_reviews.text: Excited about the fit bug orb , easy to sync with gen 4 I pad. Took about 3 minutes. After doing some walking I pushed the button on the Orb and the stats took about 20 seconds to transfer to my I pad, love it . Next step will be to have it track my sleep. Product did not arrived when promised however I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jack  Croach

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked pretty good during the day. I could not get my unit to track sleep time.
customer_reviews.author: purplewahop

customer_reviews.title: buyer read carefully
customer_reviews.text: For the price , I thought that the I phone looking devise came with the product. Well it didn't , I guess this was my fault for not reading the description better. So if you are planing on getting this devise, don't think you are getting 4 items with it.You are not. All in all it serves its purpose I had no problems downloading it on my computer. OH yes, you will also have to buy Dongle for your computer. So this is like buying a car without the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great product. The only problem is that it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The only problem is that it doesn't always send my steps but its easily fixed so I like the product
customer_reviews.author: Mee C.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: Trying to connect to Desktop via Bluetooth 4.0 dongle - no luck. Call Tech Support - they could not help me unless I gave them the registration number from the box. ( I threw the box away since I had been trying for a few days) If you buy this KEEP THE BOX. Tech Support would not take the number off of the rear of the device - unless I gave them proof of purchase. Also had a nice discussion about Bluetooth 4.0 and why they say their device is 4.0 compatible when you must buy their dongle - other 4.0 dongles will not work. So if you want to use this with a desktop add $15.00 to the cost
customer_reviews.author: AJN

customer_reviews.title: Fitbug Orb
customer_reviews.text: I love this pedometer, its the size of a watch and easy to set up. Tracks steps/miles and sleep quality. You get the app for your phone, turn the Bluetooth on then it updates when you press the button on the orb.
customer_reviews.author: Tony D

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: Love it wish it gave better instructions to put on active mode and also have no clue how to log food other then that it's pretty accurate. And I love it calculates your sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: falls out
customer_reviews.text: The bug would always fall out of my wristband and eventually lost it❗️
customer_reviews.author: Jennipher Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Fitbug! It has me obsessed with reaching my goals and tracking my sleep. Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: STEFSWORLD

customer_reviews.title: Simple...better ones out there
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. No display. Better ones out there. No social part of it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lanier

customer_reviews.title: So far it is not working. It must have ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it is not working. It must have previously been sold and sold again to me as new. When I try to register I had to get in touch with the company and they gave me another number to register but it still want download my info because it now says my serial number on the back of the orb is registered to another. So it is of no use to me money down the drain buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: wont sync bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Like others with Galaxy S4 phones, I was unable to get the orb to sync via Bluetooth. I tried everything with no luck. Without sync, this is pretty much a useless piece of junk. I returned it for full credit.
customer_reviews.author: K. Royal

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used it a lot at first but not very much now.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: it would be a good product it i can get to
customer_reviews.text: it must be me i am not getting any feedback from device. it would be a good product it i can get to work
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Buy it new! I got a used one and was unable to register it! Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: The iPhone integration with this device will not display or upload sleep data. Only exercise. All in all, it is fairly useful for tracking your activity progress. I just wish it integrated with Lose It! so I could record caloric intake in just one place, and have it populate to the FitBug Orb! Also it survived going through a complete wash cycle in the washing machine, so it is quite durable. I discovered the wrist band was inconvenient, so I just use the clip on holder.
customer_reviews.author: JHende

customer_reviews.title: but I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It worked for the first couple days. I don't know whether it is the device or my phone, but I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JoNell DeHaan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with how it looks
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Disappointed with how it looks. Not as 'sexy' as the Fitbit.
customer_reviews.author: Karen matthews

product_meta.title: Fitbug ORB Activity Tracker - Retail Packaging - Black
product_meta.description: Get fitter, healthier and happier with Fitbug's newest activity tracker. The Fitbug Orb is a discreet, button-sized device that tracks your activity around-the-clock. From steps and aerobic steps to calories burned, distance walked and even your sleeping patterns, the Fitbug Orb sends all this data wirelessly to your smartphone or tablet via Bluetooth Smart technology. You can then view all your progress in one place - on the Fitbug app, or on the robust Fitbug member portal. Super-sleek and available in three eye-catching colours: white, hot pink and black, you can choose how to wear the Fitbug Orb. With several different accessories, including wrist strap, belt clip, lanyard, which are included in the box in matching colors, you can transform your Orb into a fashion statement or hide it discreetly under your clothing. Push, stream or set up the 'Beaconing' mode for the Orb on the app; it's up to you to decide how to upload your steps and sleep data to the Fitbug account hosted on the Fitbug app. All it takes is a click of the button on the Orb to send your steps to the app. What's more, the Fitbug Orb comes with an online platform and your personal digital coach. Here you can log what you've eaten and set goals. Realistic targets are set for you to hit based on your information. You'll also receive encouraging nudges to keep you on track and a weekly newsletter called 'Bugzine', which features Fitbug's latest articles about health, well-being, nutrition and activity, plus a healthy recipe. With virtual walking challenges, Fitbug forums, expert advice and information, digital coaching alongside the Fitbug Orb to keep you motivated in the right direction.
feature_bullets: The Fitbug Orb tracks your steps, distance walked, calories burned and sleep and Compatible with iPhone 4s/5/5s/5c,iPod Touch(5th Gen),Samsung Galaxy S3,S4,S5,S4 mini,Motorola Moto G/X,LG g2/L90,Galaxy note 2/3,HTC ONE/M8, Nexus 4/5, Sony Xperia
Send your steps and sleep data wirelessly to a compatible smartphone or tablet, or via an optional dongle(sold seperately on the fitbug website) which plugs into a PC/Mac
The Fitbug Orb comes with your personal digital coach, which motivates you to move more, sleep better and eat well
Compatible tablets are iPad 3rd and 4th Gen, iPad mini and air, Samsung Galaxy Note 8.0 and 10.1, Samsung Galaxy tab 8.0,Nexus 7(2013)
Please refer the User Manual under product description
